name: Jumperoo
description:
This project was used to learn the mechanics of a 2D platformer. You can move left and right with the arrow keys and spacebar to jump. The goal of the game is to avoid traps and reach the flag.

Assets by:

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

Music and sound effects by:

https://on-jin.com/sound/hito.php

https://void1gaming.itch.io/halftone-sound-effects-pack-pro
